name: Rapid Response Community Resources
description: Now more than ever, it’s crucial to arm ourselves with knowledge, organize within our communities, and ensure everyone understands their rights—because no one should live in fear of injustice. We’ve gathered these resources to help fight back against oppression and protect our communities. Visit: https://lccrsf.org/rapid-response-community-resources/ to access the following resources: - City of San Francisco immigrant resources - Find your local rapid response network - Order a red card that sum
